root: ^friend: ouch… what the hell man, why'd you shoot me
^Me: I…. I didn't mean to, it was an accident
^friend: what do you mean it was an accident you just shot me man
^Me: its these controls, its like I forgot how to control myself for a second
^voice: haha you actually did it, did you really think I would help you?
^Me: let's just keep moving we must be close now
